verses.verse: Masters <S%G2962><s%>, <S%G3930>render<s%> <S%G1401>unto<s%> your <S%G1401>servants<s%> that which is <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2471>equal<s%>; <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2962>Master<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

withal <S%G260><s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may <S%G455>open<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> for the <S%G3056>word<s%>, to <S%G2980>speak<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1210>am<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G1210>bonds<s%>;

Let <S%G741><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3056>speech<s%> be <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G741>seasoned<s%> with <S%G217>salt<s%>, that ye may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G611>answer<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>.

whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent3992, 4314 <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> this <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5124>purpose<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5216>our<s%> <S%G4012>state<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that he may <S%G3870>comfort<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>;

together <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3682>Onesimus<s%>, the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> one <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>. They shall make <S%G1107>known<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> are done <S%G5602>here<s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> that is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2459>Justus<s%>, who <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>: <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> are my <S%G4904>fellow-workers<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, men <S%G3748>that<s%> have <S%G1096>been<s%> a <S%G3931>comfort<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>.

Epaphras <S%G1889><s%>, who <S%G3588>is<s%> one <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G782>Jesus<s%>, saluteth <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G75>striving<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G4335>prayers<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> fully <S%G4137>assured<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> that are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2993>Laodicea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3564>Nymphas<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> that is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1992>epistle<s%> hath been <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it be <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2994>Laodiceans<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> epistle <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2993>Laodicea<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> to <S%G751>Archippus<s%>, Take heed <S%G991>to<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G3880>received<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> thou <S%G4137>fulfil<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.
